mapper.select: SELECT (AVG(A.POINT), 0) AVG_POINT, COUNT(1) CNT FROM A INNER JOIN MENU ON A.SITE_ID = MENU.SITE_ID AND A.VER_IDX = MENU.VER_IDX AND A.MENU_IDX = MENU.MENU_IDX WHERE MENU.USE_POLL = '1'

SELECT 'MENU' || A.MENU_IDX GUBUN_DATA, A.MENU_IDX, (AVG(A.POINT), 0) AVG_POINT, COUNT(1) CNT FROM A INNER JOIN MENU ON A.SITE_ID = MENU.SITE_ID AND A.VER_IDX = MENU.VER_IDX AND A.MENU_IDX = MENU.MENU_IDX WHERE MENU.USE_POLL = '1'
GROUP BY A.MENU_IDX ORDER BY A.MENU_IDX ASC
SELECT COUNT(A.PIDX) CNT FROM A INNER JOIN MENU ON A.SITE_ID = MENU.SITE_ID AND A.VER_IDX = MENU.VER_IDX AND A.MENU_IDX = MENU.MENU_IDX WHERE MENU.USE_POLL = '1'

SELECT 'POINT' || OPT_POINT.OPTION_CODE GUBUN_DATA, OPT_POINT.OPTION_CODE POINT, OPT_POINT.OPTION_NAME POINT_NAME, COUNT(AA.PIDX) CNT FROM ( AND MASTER_CODE = 'MENU_POINT' ) OPT_POINT LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.* FROM A INNER JOIN MENU ON A.SITE_ID = MENU.SITE_ID AND A.VER_IDX = MENU.VER_IDX AND A.MENU_IDX = MENU.MENU_IDX WHERE MENU.USE_POLL = '1'
) AA ON OPT_POINT.OPTION_CODE = AA.POINT GROUP BY OPT_POINT.OPTION_CODE, OPT_POINT.OPTION_NAME, OPT_POINT.ORDER_IDX ORDER BY OPT_POINT.ORDER_IDX ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM A INNER JOIN MENU ON A.SITE_ID = MENU.SITE_ID AND A.VER_IDX = MENU.VER_IDX AND A.MENU_IDX = MENU.MENU_IDX WHERE MENU.USE_POLL = '1'

SELECT A.* FROM A INNER JOIN MENU ON A.SITE_ID = MENU.SITE_ID AND A.VER_IDX = MENU.VER_IDX AND A.MENU_IDX = MENU.MENU_IDX WHERE MENU.USE_POLL = '1'
ORDER BY A.PIDX DESC
